name: sheep for slaughtering, live weight to generic market for red meat, live weight | red meat, live weight | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11194/documentation

This activity links the specific "market for sheep for slaughtering, live weight" to the generic "market for red meat". It has been arbitrarily decided that 10% of the sheep meat produced feeds the generic market for red meat instead of the specific one for sheep meat.

The activity starts with the entry of the "sheep for slaughtering, live weight"

It finishes with the output of "red meat" for the generic market.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/014:Animal production/0141:Raising of cattle and buffaloes

flow.name: red meat, live weight
flow.category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/014:Animal production/0141:Raising of cattle and buffaloes

exchanges.description: It is considered that a ration 1:1 applies between the live weight of sheep and that of red meat
